name: subscription-manager
description: subscription-manager is a self-hosted tool for tracking subscriptions and recurring payments. It monitors renewal dates and costs with reminders and summaries.
features: Subscription tracking: Records all recurring subscriptions and memberships.
Renewal reminders: Alerts before subscription renewals to avoid unwanted charges.
Cost calculation: Totals monthly and yearly subscription expenses.
Payment tracking: Records payment dates and amounts for each subscription.
Category organization: Groups subscriptions by type or purpose.
Currency support: Tracks subscriptions in multiple currencies.
Cancellation tracking: Records when subscriptions were cancelled.
Free trial monitoring: Tracks trial periods to cancel before billing starts.
Spending analytics: Visualizes subscription costs with charts and trends.
Export data: Downloads subscription list for budgeting or tax purposes.
Sharing options: Tracks shared subscriptions and splits costs.
Mobile responsive: Manages subscriptions from smartphones and tablets.
